attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reason their is so much poverty is because the rich people have so much money they can get more money.
I propose a new tax be put into effect alongside other taxes.
People earning between £50,000 & £100,000 should pay a 5% tax.
Between £100,000 & £200,000 a 20% tax.
Between £200,000 & £400,000 a 35% tax.
Between £400,000 & £800,000 a 50% tax.
Between £800,000 & £2.4million a 65% tax.
Between £2.4million & £9.6million an 80% tax.
£9.6million and above a 95% tax.
The money should go to helping poorer people, starting with the poorest.
The rich may be unhappy, but it will benefit the poor. The rich will still earn more than others.
